overview: Strange things start happening when separate twists of fate bring each of three friends, Big, Dan and Beam, into contact with three strangers an old woman who tells prophecies, a little girl who sells garlands on the street and a young woman named Aom. What none of them realize is that not only is there a connection between the three females, but also between the guys themselves and their destinies. But it starts to become clear that one them is fated to die.
title: Omen
